title: Did Madame Tussauds in Berlin Place Trump Wax Figure in Dumpster?
subtitle: The Trump figurine was displayed alongside signs featuring well-known sayings of the reality TV star-turned-politician.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: In advance of the 2020 general election, Madame Tussauds wax museum in Berlin displayed the likeness of U.S. President Donald Trump in a dumpster as part of an exhibit with the sign, “Dump Trump.”
